text:
Hi  I see that your company is into Software and IT business.
 
We can provide you with 30M+ data covering all Industries and sectors across North America, 
Europe and APAC regions. We also have specialized Technology Install data of 5,200+ 
Applications with 9M+ Contacts.
 
Data fields we provide: Technology Type, Company Name, Contact Name, Title, Phone 
Number, Email Address, Physical Address, City, State, Postal Code, ZIP Code, Country, Fax, 
SIC Code, Industry and Website address.
 
We are a global database provider and preferred data partner for Enterprise, Medium and Small 
size companies and we would like to be the reason of your successful lead generation campaigns.
Data Append Test: Challenge us with your top 5 company accounts with job titles; whom you 
are looking to target to be your customers. We will get you the sample.
Please let me know your Industry type and geography for your next campaign? So I can send you
the counts and sample to evaluate.
 
Thanks,
Name
Marketing Director
LA Mirada, California
United States
 if you wish to discontinue or unsubscribe click here
